featured.text: You may have to wait for a while until the animal does something interesting or moves into a position for you to get a good shot.
Familiar fables can be narrated differently or extended in interesting and humorous ways.
Another interesting fact about angelfish is that they have an occupation in the fish world.
In town, tourists can browse through 35 number of interesting shops, such as antique stores and the shop that sells items 36 from Oregon's beautiful myrtlewood.
This interesting phenomenon becomes a subject explored by many scientists.

other.text: This story, ________, is very fascinating: there are many interesting characters in it.

definition.zh_def: 引人入勝的，令人好奇的，值得注意的。
definition.en_def: Arousing curiosity or interest; holding or catching the attention.
definition.example: The documentary was so interesting that I watched it twice.
